channel.title: Version 1.0 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 1.0.0 (2021-07-01) Cap'n Hugo 0.65.0 0.65.0 Th' requirement fer th' Cap'n Hugo version o' this theme be th' same as fer th' Learrrn theme version 2.5.0 on 2021-07-01. New New Initial fork o' th' Learrrn theme based on Learrrn 2.5.0 on 2021-07-01. This introduces no new features besides a global rename t' Relearrrn an' a new logo. For th' reasons behind fork'n th' Learrrn theme, see this comment 'n th' Learrrn issues.
